Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

OOC: A transformer's ( max/pred) beast mode has artificially produced organic 
matter to cover their beast mode. Any DNA copied from the scanned animal 
resides in this artificial matter. Ergo, if one cloned a char from it's DNA, 
one would come out with an imperfect genetic duplicate of the animal that the 
bot scanned for it's beast mode.
Any cloning of a bot would have to be cloning in a different sort, i.e. 
duplicating the bot's schematics and layering a copy of his personality over 
a blank spark.

--part1_62.1a14c1d6.2989d807_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>OOC: A transformer's ( max/pred) beast mode has artificially produced organic matter to cover their beast mode. Any DNA copied from the scanned animal resides in this artificial matter. Ergo, if one cloned a char from it's DNA, one would come out with an imperfect genetic duplicate of the animal that the bot scanned for it's beast mode.
<BR>Any cloning of a bot would have to be cloning in a different sort, i.e. duplicating the bot's schematics and layering a copy of his personality over a blank spark.</FONT></HTML>

--part1_62.1a14c1d6.2989d807_boundary--
